name: ghostboard
description: Ghostboard is a self-hosted analytics dashboard for Ghost CMS. It provides traffic insights, top posts, and engagement charts, designed to give blog owners visibility into audience behavior without external analytics trackers.
features: Ghost CMS Analytics: Track traffic and engagement metrics specifically designed for Ghost blog installations.
Traffic Insights: Monitor page views, unique visitors, and referral sources with detailed breakdowns.
Top Posts Tracking: Identify your most popular content with engagement metrics and trend analysis.
Privacy-Friendly: Self-hosted analytics without third-party trackers or data sharing.
Engagement Charts: Visualize reader behavior with interactive charts and time-series data.
Audience Behavior: Understand how readers interact with your content through detailed analytics.
No External Dependencies: Keep all analytics data on your own infrastructure for complete privacy.
Dashboard View: Access all metrics through a clean, focused dashboard tailored for bloggers.
